p: The quantum efficiencies ( QE) of all prepared samples as a function of excitation wavelength and Eu 3+ concentrations are depicted in Figure 6. The QE value for the 50% Eu 3+ doped sample is close to unity under 393.5 nm excitation. Such high QE value is very favourable for practical application. Further increase of the Eu 3+ concentration resulted in decreased QE values under the same excitation wavelength. Moreover, excitation at 265 and 465 nm has also resulted in somewhat lower QE values. This leads to a conclusion that the synthesized phosphors in practical application should be used with near-UV emitting LEDs.
